body_html:
So, I was going through this tutorial: https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/master/tutorials/mnist/tf/index.html#tensorflow-mechanics-101 and I got an error when reading the data which was

data_sets = input_data.read_data_sets(FLAGS.train_dir, FLAGS.fake_data)

It works fine if I just enter the directory instead of FLAGS.train_dir.

body:
So, I was going through this tutorial: https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/master/tutorials/mnist/tf/index.html#tensorflow-mechanics-101 and I got an error when reading the data which was 

data_sets = input_data.read_data_sets(FLAGS.train_dir, FLAGS.fake_data)

It works fine if I just enter the directory instead of FLAGS.train_dir.
